titleStmt.title: Newes of the present miseries of Rushia occasioned by the late warre in that countrey. Commenced betweene Sigimond now King of Poland. Charles late King of Swethland. Demetrius, the last of the name, Emperour of Rushia. Together with the memorable occurrences of our owne nationall forces, English, and Scottes, vnder the pay of the now King of Swethland.
titleStmt.author: Brereton, Henry.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by N. Okes] for Iohn Bache, and are to be sold at his shop on the backe-side of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The miseries of Rushia.
Identified as STC 21462 on UMI microfilm, reel 1494.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library and the Queen's College Library.
Appears at reel 1266 #7 (British Library copy), and at reel 1494 #6 (Queen's College Library copy).

place.placeName: his shop on the backe-side of the Royall Exchange
